Image titled Record a Zoom Meeting on iPhone or iPad Step 7 1 Open Zoom on your iPhone or iPad. It s the blue icon with a white video camera inside. You ll usually find it on the home screen. If you re not already signed into your Zoom account, sign in now. Image titled Record a Zoom Meeting on iPhone or iPad Step 8 2 Select whether you re starting or joining a meeting. Tap Start Meeting if you re the one hosting the meeting. It s at the top-left corner of the screen. This brings you to a new screen, but don t hit the Start Meeting button there yet. Tap Join (the blue icon with a blue and white + inside) if you re joining someone s meeting, and then enter the Meeting ID (provided to you by the meeting s host). This brings you to a new screen but don t hit the Join button there yet. Image titled Record a Zoom Meeting on iPhone or iPad Step 9 3 Swipe up from the bottom of the screen. Don t do this until you re ready to start recording. The Control Center will appear. Image titled Record a Zoom Meeting on iPhone or iPad Step 10 4 Tap the record button. It s the circle inside of another circle. The button will display a brief countdown and then the screen will start recording. Image titled Record a Zoom Meeting on iPhone or iPad Step 11 5 Swipe down on the Control Center. This returns you to the previous screen, which is the Zoom meeting. The screen is now recording. Image titled Record a Zoom Meeting on iPhone or iPad Step 12 6 Return to Zoom and tap or . The button you tap depends on whether you started a new meeting or are joining an existing one. The meeting will begin, and it's being recorded. When you re ready to stop recording, go to the next step. Image titled Record a Zoom Meeting on iPhone or iPad Step 13 7 Swipe up from the bottom of the screen. The Control Center will open. Image titled Record a Zoom Meeting on iPhone or iPad Step 14 8 Tap the recording button. It s the same button you pressed earlier, except now it s red. This ends the recording. You ll find the finished video in your iPhone or iPad s gallery. Advertisement
